comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:7.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/7.0.1
Build ID: 20110928134238

Steps to reproduce:

Open a link in an RSS eed from MS Outlook(loads webpage in FF).
Click desktop icon to open new FF window.


Actual results:

Nothing.  No new FF window opens.


Expected results:

A new blank FF window should open.

comments.creator: addv@aresemail.com
comments.author: addv@aresemail.com
comments.text: Any link clicked from MS Outlook causes the issue, not just RSS feeds. When initially opened FF from desktop icon, clicking icon again results in expected behavior of opening a new window.
comments.raw_text: Any link clicked from MS Outlook causes the issue, not just RSS feeds. When initially opened FF from desktop icon, clicking icon again results in expected behavior of opening a new window.
